entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 14. POP 40%

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light after midnight. Low 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
